Room.Name: Lankshire Parkway
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Lankshire Parkway, surrounded by corn and wheat.
Room.LongDescription: Facing east, you can see the entrance to the Klondike Wheat Fields. The Klondike Office is always willing to hire unskilled labor to help them harvest their wheat and rid the fields of unwanted pests like rats and other vermin. On the west side of the road is the entrance to the DeNail Corn Fields. Farmer DeNail is also always willing to get some unskilled labor into the fields to do some work. After all, it helps the economy.
